events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role and will review your credentials in detail.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the backend developer position.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will contact you shortly.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully, and the recruiter confirmed your technical skills align well with our requirements.
You responded promptly to the interview feedback and expressed enthusiasm to proceed to the next technical round.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2:00 PM UTC with our senior engineering panel.
The technical interview was completed successfully. The panel appreciated your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 14th at 11:00 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well. You demonstrated strong communication skills and a clear understanding of the company values.
We have sent you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position including salary details, benefits, and start date options.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and asked a few clarifying questions regarding remote work policies.
You formally accepted the offer, confirming your start date and thanking the team for the opportunity.
Your onboarding process has begun. Welcome to the engineering team! Orientation and training schedules are being finalized.
The hiring process for your position is officially closed. We look forward to your contributions as an integral part of our engineering group.
